interviews.title: Park thrilled to go to Oilers as next-to-last selection in 2025 NHL Draft
interviews.content:
"I actually came yesterday for Ryker Lee, and I thought we were going to hang out today, but he flew out on a private jet to Nashville this morning,"

"It was a little bit of a surprise but couldn't be more happy,"

"223rd overall and the second to last pick in the #NHLDraft , but Aidan Park stuck around for it! √∞¬ü¬ë¬è pic.twitter.com/NwzSoDIFOz ‚Äî NHL (@NHL) June 28, 2025 Oilers director of amateur scouting Rick Pracey said Park was a player the team's United States-based scouts were high on, and was getting nervous that another team could jump the line and grab Park before their chance came up."
